Container.Name: Watchlistarr
Container.Overview:
Sync RSS Plex watchlists in realtime with Sonarr and Radarr
https://github.com/nylonee/watchlistarr

Config.Name: Sonarr API Key
Config.Description: Your Sonarr API Key, found in Sonarr UI Settings -> General

Config.Name: Radarr API Key
Config.Description: Your Sonarr API Key, found in Sonarr UI Settings -> General

Config.Name: Plex Watchlist URL 1
Config.Description: Your Plex Watchlist URL, generated on https://app.plex.tv/desktop/#!/settings/watchlist

Config.Name: Refresh Interval (Seconds)
Config.Description: The number of seconds to wait between syncing watchlists

Config.Name: Sonarr Quality Profile
Config.Description: The Sonarr Quality Profile you'd like new shows to inherit

Config.Name: Sonarr Root Folder
Config.Description: Your Sonarr Root folder, found in Sonarr Settings

Config.Name: Radarr Quality Profile
Config.Description: The Radarr Quality Profile you'd like new movies to inherit

Config.Name: Radarr Root Folder
Config.Description: Your Radarr Root folder, found in Radarr Settings

Config.Name: Sonarr Bypass Exclusions
Config.Description: Set to true to bypass excluded sonarr lists

Config.Name: Radarr Bypass Exclusions
Config.Description: Set to true to bypass excluded radarr lists
